import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { ThemeProvider, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Button, Text, Icon, Anchor, Image } from "atomize"; import NetflixModal from "./NetflixModal" import Cliques from "./Cliques" import NewCliqueForm from "../NewCliqueForm" function MyCliques() { const [showComponent, setShowComponent] = useState(false) const onButtonClick = () => { setShowComponent(true) } return( {showComponent ? <> MY CLIQUES ADD A NEW CLIQUE : }



) } export default MyCliques;
